channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It's Prime Day, and WIRED is Live-Blogging The Best and Worst Of It
item.description: We're tracking Amazon Prime Day deals, trends, and the general state of American capitalism live throughout the Big Deal Days sale.

item.title: The 13 Best Power Bank Prime Day Deals
item.description: Banish battery anxiety for less with these power bank bargains from Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days.

item.title: This Is the MacBook I'd Buy For Amazon Big Deal Days This Year
item.description: With new MacBooks on the horizon and Prime Day discounts here, here's my advice on what MacBooks to buy today.

item.title: The Best Amazon Echo Deal for Prime Day (October 2025): The Echo Spot
item.description: Only one smart speaker out of Amazon's lineup is worth investing in during Prime Day. For any other speaker, it's better to wait.

item.title: Revolut aims to take on Indian banks and their ‘criminal’ forex fees
item.description: Revolut plans to onboard 20 million users in India by 2030 and process more than $7 billion in transactions.

item.title: The Sony WH-1000XM6 Get a Price Cut During Amazon's 2025 Prime Day Sales Event
item.description: The best noise-canceling headphones you can buy are on sale during Amazon Prime Day.

item.title: Trump’s DOE proposes cutting billions in grants for GM, Ford, and lots of startups
item.description: Trump's Department of Energy wants to cancel billions more in awards that were granted by the Biden administration, and startups are in the crosshairs...

item.title: Wall Street analysts explain how AMD’s own stock will pay for OpenAI’s billions in chip purchases
item.description: AMD's unusual deal to finance OpenAI's chip purchases could grant the AI model maker up to $100 billion, analyst estimates.

item.title: You can’t libel the dead. But that doesn’t mean you should deepfake them.
item.description: "Please, just stop sending me AI videos of Dad," the late Robin Williams' daughter Zelda wrote on Instagram.

item.title: Google launches its AI vibe-coding app Opal in 15 more countries
item.description: The app, which lets you create mini web apps using text prompts, is now available in Canada, India, Japan, South Korea, Vietnam, Indonesia, Brazil, Si...
